properties.name: Blog of note: Jail Peter Odili ? Nigerian civil action blog site
properties.description: Posted by Rlanham540Nigeriahttp://jailpeterodili.wordpress.com/about/ There are more and more of these…the voice of real democracy.  Let us hope that those who use them do not politicize them unnecessarily.  The need is for genuine information…not bile and anger.

properties.name: Some thoughts on an emergent future
properties.description: Posted by Rlanham540Blacksburg, VAActor network theory (ANT) is not so much a theory as it is a way of looking at things. Like science, it is increasingly a verb, not a noun. It combines skepticism, postmodern doubts about strong identities and policy based on categories, and a desire to see borders and boundaries gently softened and [...]
